# Data {#sec-data}

Some of our data is of penguins (@fig-bills)-[exmample of cross references], from @palmerpenguins.

```{r}
#| include: FALSE
#| label: fig-bills
#| fig-cap: Bills of penguins
#| echo: false

ggplot(penguins, aes(x = island, fill = species)) +
  geom_bar(alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4"),
                    guide = "none") +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(~species, ncol = 1) +
  coord_flip()
```



# Results
This histogram reflects the amount new marriage happens each year from the year of 2011 to 2024.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false

ggplot(data = data, 
       aes(x = year, y = marriage_licenses)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") + labs(title = "Amount New Marriage Each Year 2011 - 2024", x = "Year", y = "Marriage Number")
```
